item.title: On Clojure (part 2)
item.description: Distributing QtJambi with Clojure. How to bundle up Clojure programs for distribution One of the questions I’ve seen coming up a few times is how to distribute clojure programs. The obvious answer is to build executable JAR files. A while ago I produced a simple database application for my girlfriends recruitment business, NRecruit. I developed this using Clojure on my Arch Linux based laptop, and deployed to her MacBook running OS X Leopard.
